short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To use, type 'npm' plus your search term into the url bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JavaScript developer get a shortcut to searching NPM for packages by typing the text 'npm' and then the search term.  Like 'npm which' would search the NPM registry for packages with the name 'which'.
